title: What can I do to fix music? Screen shuts off and music stops playing.
content: Music keeps shutting must have live caption on and when the screen shuts off it times out.  Doesn't matter which type of music file or the music player app.  It happens with the phone speaker pixel headphones and any device that's connected via Bluetooth.  Please Google fix this it's starting to get ridiculous and very frustrating.  I have read all of the forums and all the fixes suggested have not worked.
